name: CLOK
description:
You play as the lost soul who need to find the pieces of it's old heart lost inside a Steam Punk world.

Controls: Differs wit heach body inhabited.

WASD - for moving -

Space - Jump

E - Interact while in Smoke form / Enter Bodies

F - Leave bodies

T - Teleport while in a Tele Bot.

- OBJECTIVE -

Find all the Heartpieces in a mazelike game.
